Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: One of the famous mata temple of ujjain
Review: it situated at heart of the city , as per name Nagarkot ( means godess mataji is the caretaker of every citizen of the city and she take care them ) you can find hugh crowd there during the navratri festival

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Queen of the city temple
Review: The temple has a significant importance both arciologically and traditionally due to its association with the famous king of the region ,the vikram adithya,and ,the nath followers.its considered as the protected deity of the city.

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Best to visit during Navratri
Review: We visited Nagarkot ki Rani Temple during Navratri & the temple was very beautifully decorated with flowers and fruits

Name: Veer2468
Title: Nice temple
Review: Its a good temple to visit in Ujjain city. Beautifully decorated. Peaceful and calm. It is one of the ancient temple.

Name: Manish B
Title: Ancient Temple
Review: Another very good temple and ancient temple to visit and worship the goddess. During navratri the temple is beautifully decorated and lots of people visit the temple.

Name: Shubham06
Title: Nice during Navaratri
Review: it is a good sight during the period of navaratri when everything is glittering and shining and filled with people.

Name: npn2000
Title: Nagarkot ki Rani Temple
Review: Nagarkot ki Rani Temple is another landmark temple and ponds around, special lighting in navratri festival

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Ancient temple established by Vikramaditya
Review: Nagarkot Ki Rani is the guardian deity of the south-west corner of the city. The temple is believed to have been established by Vikramaditya. Behind the temple is Govardhan sagar, one of the seven sacred lakes of Ujjain.
